member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.OAuthBearerAppBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to add OAuth Bearer authentication capabilities to an HTTP application pipeline

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.OAuthBearerAppBuilderExtensions.UseOAuthBearerAuthentication(Microsoft.AspNet.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions},System.String)
member.summary: Adds Bearer token processing to an HTTP application pipeline. This middleware understands appropriately formatted and secured tokens which appear in the request header. If the Options.AuthenticationMode is Active, the claims within the bearer token are added to the current request's IPrincipal User. If the Options.AuthenticationMode is Passive, then the current request is not modified, but IAuthenticationManager AuthenticateAsync may be used at any time to obtain the claims from the request's bearer token. See also http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6749
member.param: Options which control the processing of the bearer header.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationDefaults
member.summary: Default values used by authorization server and bearer authentication.

member.name: F:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationDefaults.AuthenticationScheme
member.summary: Default value for AuthenticationScheme property in the OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions and OAuthAuthorizationServerOptions.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationHandler.HandleAuthenticateAsync
member.summary: Searches the 'Authorization' header for a 'Bearer' token. If the 'Bearer' token is found, it is validated using set in the options.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationMiddleware
member.summary: Bearer authentication middleware component which is added to an HTTP pipeline. This class is not created by application code directly, instead it is added by calling the the IAppBuilder UseOAuthBearerAuthentication extension method.

Bearer authentication component which is added to an HTTP pipeline. This constructor is not called by application code directly, instead it is added by calling the the IAppBuilder UseOAuthBearerAuthentication extension method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationMiddleware.CreateHandler
member.summary: Called by the AuthenticationMiddleware base class to create a per-request handler.
member.returns: A new instance of the request handler

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Options class provides information needed to control Bearer Authentication middleware behavior

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of bearer authentication options with default values.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.MetadataAddress
member.summary: Gets or sets the discovery endpoint for obtaining metadata

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.Authority
member.summary: Gets or sets the Authority to use when making OpenIdConnect calls.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.Audience
member.summary: Gets or sets the audience for any received JWT token.
member.value: The expected audience for any received JWT token.

members.member:
Gets or sets the challenge to put in the "WWW-Authenticate" header.
TODO - brentschmaltz, should not be null.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.Notifications
member.summary: The object provided by the application to process events raised by the bearer authentication middleware. The application may implement the interface fully, or it may create an instance of OAuthBearerAuthenticationProvider and assign delegates only to the events it wants to process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to retrieve metadata. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value is a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout when using the backchannel to make an http call.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.Configuration
member.summary: Configuration provided directly by the developer. If provided, then MetadataAddress and the Backchannel properties will not be used. This information should not be updated during request processing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.ConfigurationManager
member.summary: Responsible for retrieving, caching, and refreshing the configuration from metadata. If not provided, then one will be created using the MetadataAddress and Backchannel properties.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.RefreshOnIssuerKeyNotFound
member.summary: Gets or sets if a metadata refresh should be attempted after a SecurityTokenSignatureKeyNotFoundException. This allows for automatic recovery in the event of a signature key rollover. This is enabled by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.SystemClock
member.summary: Used to know what the current clock time is when calculating or validating token expiration. When not assigned default is based on DateTimeOffset.UtcNow. This is typically needed only for unit testing.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.SecurityTokenValidators
member.summary: Gets or sets the for validating tokens.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationOptions.TokenValidationParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the TokenValidationParameters
member.remarks: Contains the types and definitions required for validating a token.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.Resources.Exception_OptionMustBeProvided
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' option must be provided..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.Resources.Exception_ValidatorHandlerMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An ICertificateValidator cannot be specified at the same time as an HttpMessageHandler unless it is a WebRequestHandler..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications
member.summary: OAuth bearer token middleware provider

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications.AuthenticationFailed
member.summary: Invoked if exceptions are thrown during request processing. The exceptions will be re-thrown after this event unless suppressed.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications.MessageReceived
member.summary: Invoked when a protocol message is first received.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications.SecurityTokenReceived
member.summary: Invoked with the security token that has been extracted from the protocol message.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications.SecurityTokenValidated
member.summary: Invoked after the security token has passed validation and a ClaimsIdentity has been generated.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.Authentication.OAuthBearer.OAuthBearerAuthenticationNotifications.ApplyChallenge
member.summary: Invoked to apply a challenge sent back to the caller.

member.summary: Extension methods to add OAuth Bearer authentication capabilities to an HTTP application pipeline
